00023 #ifndef __MT_REQUEST_QUEUE_H__
00024 #define __MT_REQUEST_QUEUE_H__
00025 
00026 #include <queue>
00027 #include "sys/Thread.h"
00028 #include "sys/ConditionVar.h"
00029 #include "sys/Mutex.h"
00030 #include "sys/Dbg.h"
00031 
00032 namespace mt
00033 {
00034 
00051 template<typename T>
00052 class RequestQueue
00053 {
00054 public:
00055 
00057     RequestQueue()
00058     {
00059         mAvailableSpace = new sys::ConditionVar(&mQueueLock);
00060         mAvailableItems = new sys::ConditionVar(&mQueueLock);
00061     }
00062 
00064     ~RequestQueue()
00065     {
00066         delete mAvailableSpace;
00067         delete mAvailableItems;
00068     }
00069 
00070     // Put a (copy of, unless T is a pointer) request on the queue
00071     void enqueue(T request)
00072     {
00073 #ifdef THREAD_DEBUG
00074         dbg_printf("Locking (enqueue)\n");
00075 #endif
00076         assert(mQueueLock.lock());
00077         mRequestQueue.push(request);
00078 #ifdef THREAD_DEBUG
00079         dbg_printf("Unlocking (enqueue), new size [%d]\n", mRequestQueue.size());
00080 #endif
00081         assert(mQueueLock.unlock());
00082 
00083         mAvailableItems->signal();
00084     }
00085 
00086     // Retrieve (by reference) T from the queue. blocks until ok
00087     void dequeue(T& request)
00088     {
00089 #ifdef THREAD_DEBUG
00090         dbg_printf("Locking (dequeue)\n");
00091 #endif
00092         assert(mQueueLock.lock());
00093         while (isEmpty())
00094             mAvailableItems->wait();
00095 
00096         request = mRequestQueue.front();
00097         mRequestQueue.pop();
00098 
00099 #ifdef THREAD_DEBUG
00100         dbg_printf("Unlocking (dequeue), new size [%d]\n", mRequestQueue.size());
00101 #endif
00102         assert(mQueueLock.unlock());
00103         mAvailableSpace->signal();
00104     }
00105 
00106     // Check to see if its empty
00107     inline bool isEmpty()
00108     {
00109         return (mRequestQueue.size() == 0);
00110     }
00111 
00112     // Check the length
00113     inline int length()
00114     {
00115         return mRequestQueue.size();
00116     }
00117 
00118     void clear()
00119     {
00120 #ifdef THREAD_DEBUG
00121         dbg_printf("Locking (dequeue)\n");
00122 #endif
00123         assert(mQueueLock.lock());
00124         while (!isEmpty())
00125             mRequestQueue.pop();
00126 
00127 #ifdef THREAD_DEBUG
00128         dbg_printf("Unlocking (dequeue), new size [%d]\n", mRequestQueue.size());
00129 #endif
00130         assert(mQueueLock.unlock());
00131         mAvailableSpace->signal();
00132     }
00133 
00134 private:
00136     std::queue<T> mRequestQueue;
00138     sys::ConditionVar *mAvailableSpace;
00140     sys::ConditionVar *mAvailableItems;
00142     sys::Mutex mQueueLock;
00143 };
00144 
00145 typedef RequestQueue<sys::Runnable*> RunnableRequestQueue;
00146 }
00147 
00148 #endif // __MT_REQUEST_QUEUE_H__
